column52: With the Johnny Depp vs. Amber Heard trial, there has been a vast amount of information brought to light, clearly showing that Amber Heard's allegations of being sexually and physically abused has very little basis. The evidence that thas been uncovered, shows that Amber Heard has been the aggressor towards Johnny Depp and other partners in her past. It is absurd that Amber Heard, who many professional body language experts, lawyer's, psychologist and Doctors are claiming that her testimony in recent days about being sexually abused is unbelievable, and at times down right deceitful. Having Amber Heard as an ambassador for female rights is an insult to women, especially those who have actually been abused. There is enough information and evidence to cast doubt to her claims of having been sexually and physically abused. The ACLU holds all the cards in dropping her as their ambassador for female rights.  If this petition serves it's purpose, it will allow the ACLU to choose an individual with more substantial moral fiber to represent victims, specifically females who have suffered abuse. An individual who is clearly caught on tape of being, at best, verbally abusive in a relationship should not be rewarded in being the spokesperson for individual's who have suffered any type of abuse.

It is absurd that Amber Heard, who many professional body language experts, lawyer's, psychologist and Doctors are claiming that her testimony in recent days about being sexually abused is unbelievable, and at times down right deceitful. Having Amber Heard as an ambassador for female rights is an insult to women, especially those who have actually been abused. There is enough information and evidence to cast doubt to her claims of having been sexually and physically abused. The ACLU holds all the cards in dropping her as their ambassador for female rights.  If this petition serves it's purpose, it will allow the ACLU to choose an individual with more substantial moral fiber to represent victims, specifically females who have suffered abuse. An individual who is clearly caught on tape of being, at best, verbally abusive in a relationship should not be rewarded in being the spokesperson for individual's who have suffered any type of abuse.
